headline.main: For Better or Worse: New Books Forecast the Next Technologies

keywords.value: The Signals Are Talking: Why Today's Fringe Is Tomorrow's Mainstream (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

keywords.value: Whiplash: How to Survive Our Faster Future (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: What do futurists see on the horizon? In “The Signals Are Talking,” Amy Webb argues that tomorrow’s trends will come from today’s fringe. In “Whiplash,” Joi Ito and Jeff Howe outline specific categories of change....
lead_paragraph: What do futurists see on the horizon? In “The Signals Are Talking,” Amy Webb argues that tomorrow’s trends will come from today’s fringe. In “Whiplash,” Joi Ito and Jeff Howe outline specific categories of change.
